means: （使）变得更坏，（使）恶化( worsen的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Ian's rages and aberrant behavior worsened.
sentence.Network_cn: 伊恩的怒气越来越大，反常行为也愈发恶劣。

sentence.Network_en: Already low living standards have been worsened by stringent economic reforms.
sentence.Network_cn: 严谨的经济改革使本已很低的生活水平愈加恶化.

sentence.Network_en: My temper worsened as the day went on.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The driving conditions worsened with the dense fog ., 浓浓的烟雾使得驾驶条件更加恶化.
as my financial situation worsened and I became overwhelmed by debt , I gave up on goals of any sort .当我的财务状况恶化的时候，我被债务打垮了，随后放弃了所有目标。
as the Japanese recession has worsened , younger workers have taken the brunt of wage cuts and layoffs , especially in manufacturing .随著市民社会自身的成长壮大，市民社会试图改革媒介来挽救这种媒介危机和民主危机。

list.abs: lack energy , poor appetite , weight loss , metallic or ammonia taste in the mouth , skin color changes , and worsening memory .虚弱，乏力，食欲不振，体重减轻，口中有金属或氨味，皮肤变色，记忆减退。
BBC Learning English ... dominated headlines 垄断报端 steadily worsened 逐步恶化 banking institutions 金融机构.
Sometimes PTSD symptoms worsen and ordinary efforts at coping don ' t seem to work very well ., 有时 , 会发生 PTSD 症状恶化 , 一般治疗手段不起作用的情况.
worsening environment catalyzes the commercial chance of antibacteria building material., 环境恶化催生抗菌建材商机.

entry.def: If a bad situation worsens or if something worsens it, it becomes more difficult, unpleasant, or unacceptable.

example.ex: The security forces had to intervene to prevent the situation worsening...
example.tran: 安全部队不得不介入，以防止局势进一步恶化。

example.ex: These options would actually worsen the economy and add to the deficit...
example.tran: 这些选择实际上只会造成经济形势更加恶化，赤字愈见增加。

means.word_mean: 1. changed for the worse in health or fitness;

auth_sentence.content: Then the group's opinion of Mogoeng quickly worsened.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then the group's opinion of Mogoeng quickly worsened.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then the group's opinion of Mogoeng quickly worsened.

auth_sentence.content: Meanwhile, Spain said its economic conditions have worsened.
auth_sentence.res_content: Meanwhile, Spain said its economic conditions have worsened.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Meanwhile, Spain said its economic conditions have worsened.

auth_sentence.content: Pre-trial detention had worsened her condition, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pre-trial detention had worsened her condition, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pre-trial detention had worsened her condition, he said.
